t: Amazon Stock Chart — NASDAQ:AMZN Stock Price — TradingView
s: (AMZN) has been trading within a 18-month Bullish Megaphone pattern whose latest bottom was on the April 07 2025 Low. Since then, the pattern has started its new Bullish Leg, which has been confirmed by the break-out above its 1D MA50 (blue trend-line) and the 1W RSI's above its MA.
